title: The Favorites - NFL Week 13 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 13 Gambling Preview
description:
With the turkey carcasses picked clean and a slew of underdogs covering last week, The Action Network's Chad Millman and professional NFL bettor Simon Hunter return to comb over every game on a lucky Week 13 board. Is now the time to hammer the Pittsburgh Steelers? Are the Patriots the side on Monday Night Football? And should we hold our noses one more time on the Jaguars? Simon and Chad debate every side as they start to build another winner card for Sunday's NFL action.

NO DAL (7 MIN)

LAC CIN (10 MIN)

MIN DET (12 MIN)

MIA NYG (15 MIN)

TB ATL (18 MIN)

IND HOU (22 MIN)

AZ CHI (24 MIN)

PHI NYG (26 MIN)

JAX LAR (30 MIN)

WFT LV (32 MIN)

SF SEA (33 MIN)

BLT PIT (35 MIN)

DEN KC (37 MIN)

NE BUF (39 MIN)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
